title: New: Exploradora – Yard Rock
body:
I’ll be honest, I’m not too keen on the name – **Exploradora**.

Ugh, it has a clumsy, cumbersome feel to it, quite unlike their debut track, _Yard Rock_, which is a slick, vaguely Yeah Yeah Yeah’s style number, but replacing the ferocious, driving guitars with overly emotional vocal sections. Perfectly polished, _Yard Rock_ is ready to seep into ears and hearts all around the world. Check it out below.

_you’ve got me sleeping with my eyes open now_

Perfectly polished, Yard Rock is ready \[…\]
